incident.message: Formatting %d followed by words ("members"): This should probably be a plural rather than a string
Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `AnalyticsManager` which has field `context` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak
Modifier parameter should be the first optional parameter
Modifier parameter should be the first optional parameter
Modifier parameter should be the first optional parameter
Modifier factory functions should not be marked as @Composable, and should use composed instead
Using `setJavaScriptEnabled` can introduce XSS vulnerabilities into your application, review carefully
Using `setJavaScriptEnabled` can introduce XSS vulnerabilities into your application, review carefully
This field leaks a context object
This field leaks a context object
Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES javadoc for details.
